title: Minnesota DMV Practice Test
description: Official practice test for the Minnesota Driver's License Exam

questions.text: What does a red octagonal sign mean?
questions.explanation: A red octagonal sign always means STOP. You must come to a complete stop at the stop line, if marked, or before entering the crosswalk or intersection.

questions.text: What is the speed limit in urban residential areas unless otherwise posted?
questions.explanation: In Minnesota, the speed limit in urban residential areas is 30 mph unless otherwise posted.

questions.text: When two vehicles reach an intersection at the same time, which vehicle has the right of way?
questions.explanation: When two vehicles reach an intersection at the same time, the vehicle on the right has the right of way unless otherwise indicated by signs or signals.
